name: Down n' Up
description:
Down n' Up is a platformer where you take control of a weird creature that is only capable of one action: jumping.
...as a gamer, that's something you're good at, right?

REACHING THE TOP WON'T BE AN EASY TASK

  • A unique gameplay: fully control the angle and velocity of your jump with the mouse cursor or gamepad stick
  • You are able to stick to any platform, but be careful: you will peel off after a few seconds
  • New game mechanics for each zone: blocks in rhythm, moving platforms, portals, and more to discover along the way
  • The whole game is contained in one giant map, so you better not fall from too high

MANY OTHER CHALLENGES AWAIT YOU

  • Find and collect all 20 stars of the game: some of them are well hidden, and others are very hard to catch
  • Race to the top with the developer's ghost (that's me), or with the ghost of your previous run
  • You can even race with your friend's ghost

Climb higher and higher and remember: be careful not to fall.
